p: There has never been a greater need for investigations of climate change and dissemination of credible, understandable, and indisputable information on its potential to affect the health and lives of children. The NIEHS will continue to work with all of our partners, including those across the federal government, throughout our stakeholder community, and within our World Health Organization Collaborating Centre and global network, to foster such research and its translation to those who can use it to make sound public health decisions.
